item.title: Deep sink hole between 44-46 Belmont Road, 8th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 67, Belmont Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Illegal pavement parking from shop keeper: every day / all day, 8th July
item.description:
There are no dropped kerbs here. Vehicle access is illegal. Shop keeper drives across pedestrian crossing to park here. This has been going on daily every day for many years. The shop keeper enjoys free parking / is clearly not getting PCNs. Bollards??

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mortimer Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 83 Great Titchfield street W1 bags, 8th July
item.description:
Hi are 84 Great Titchfield seem to place their bags out outside the collection times ? This unfortunately seems to be ongoing issue with this block , leaving bags out anytime and this encourages other people to dump their bags and rubbish, can leaflets be dropped reminding them of the collection times. thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 83, Great Titchfield Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet
